item.title: Worldmessage - Problem
item.dc:creator: @shaddixpkz shaddixpkz
item.description:
@shaddixpkz wrote:

Well, i kinda added mystery boxes and all works fine. I tried to add a worldmessage so everyone sees what the person got out of the mysterybox. I used this

if (itemId == 6199) { //Mystery Box
int random[][] = {
{1050, 1}, {15098, 1}, {1038, 1}, {15272, 1},{557, 14}, {4151, 1}, {995, 1000000}, {555, 14}, {1044, 1}, {1046, 1}, {1048, 1}, {1053, 1}, {1055, 1}, {1057, 1}, {18349, 1}, {18351, 1}, {18353, 1}, {18355, 1}, {18357, 1}, {1040, 1}, {555, 14}, {556, 14},{1042, 1}, {558, 14}, {559, 14}, {15270, 1}, {560, 14}, {561, 14}, {562, 14}, {563, 14}, {564, 14}, {565, 14}, {554, 14}, {555, 14}, {556, 14}, {557, 14}, {558, 14}, {559, 14}, {560, 14}, {561, 14}, {562, 14}, {563, 14}, {564, 14}, {565, 14}
};
int rand = Utils.random(random.length);
player.getInventory().deleteItem(6199, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(random[rand][0],
random[rand][1]);
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“You’ve recieved an item from the Mystery Box!”);
World.sendWorldMessage(player.getDisplayName() + " has received a <col=800000> " + Item.getItemId + " from a mystery box", false);
return;
}

but it won’t work. Help please ?

Read full topic
